entry.title: Powers Steak Tip Marinade
entry.content:
Tips

  • salt and ground black pepper to taste
  • 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
  • 1 pinch Montreal steak seasoning, or to taste

Marinade

  • 1/3 cup extra virgin olive oil
  • 1/3 cup Worcestershire sauce
  • 1/3 cup soy sauce
  • 3 tablespoons Dijon mustard
  • 3 cloves garlic, chopped
  • 1 dash liquid smoke flavoring
  • 1 TBL Red Pepper
entry.summary: Tips salt and ground black pepper to taste 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste 1 pinch Montreal steak seasoning, or to taste
